alert.note: Alert for Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 6:57PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Big Horn County through 745 PM MDT... At 656 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles north of Fort Smith, or 19 miles southwest of Hardin, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail, along with brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crow Agency, St. Xavier and Crow Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn
